nodes.name: Adzuna API
nodes.notes:
Fetches jobs from Adzuna API
Update 'what' and 'where' params as needed
Requires 'Adzuna API' Custom Auth credential

nodes.name: Transform Job Data
nodes.notes: Cleans and structures job data for Google Sheets

nodes.name: Read Existing Job IDs
nodes.notes:
Reads all existing job_id values from column A
Continues even if sheet is empty

nodes.name: Any New Jobs?
nodes.notes: Only continues if there are new jobs to add

nodes.name: Append New Jobs Only
nodes.notes: Appends only new jobs - never updates existing ones
